text:
Thank you to the Prime Minister and the fed govt for announcing $1.7 billion to accelerate cleanup of orphaned and abandoned wells in Canada's energy sector.

This is critical to getting thousands of people in the energy sector back to work immediately.

https://t.co/FMW6RYX4FG
